data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lindquist, Evert E., Sidorchuk, Ekaterina A. (2019): A new species of Podapolipus (Acari: Heterostigmata: Podapolipidae) from an Australian gryllacridid cricket (Orthoptera), with keys to orthopteran-associated species of the genus. Zootaxa 4647 (1): 115-133, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.11|6 occurrences
